race_name: Dirty Hector - New York State Championship

top_categories.workout_context: 81ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Dirty Hector - New York State Championship's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
At Dirty Hector - New York State Championship, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Dirty Hector - New York State Championship's Finger Lakes hills, Wine country forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 62 miles.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Dirty Hector - New York State Championship. Train it until it feels boring.
5,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
5,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
62 miles on finger Lakes hills gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Dirty Hector - New York State Championship, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Low-cadence force work for 5,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on finger Lakes hills gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Dirty Hector - New York State Championship’s 62 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Dirty Hector - New York State Championship requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on finger lakes hills gravel to build confidence. Expect: finger lakes hills, wine country, state championship.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Race Simulation, and Over Under to prepare you for 62 miles of finger lakes hills gravel in Trumansburg, New York.
